H39.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Joktan<SDBH:יָקְטָן>}; descendant of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of ethnic group with the same name

H211.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Joktan<SDBH:יָקְטָן>}; descendant of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as the founder of a people living in a region with the same name

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H3355.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eber<SDBH:עֵבֶר>}; brother of {L:Peleg<SDBH:פֶּלֶג>}; descendant of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}

H4186.def: = place where an inanimate object is located, such as the statue of a deity and a town

H4852.def: = location; ► one of the boundaries of the territory of the descendants of {L:Joktan<SDBH:יָקְטָן>}

H5611.def: = an official count or a numbering of persons

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8035.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H4940.def: = a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

H3956.def: = the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8435.def: = the relative order in which children of the same father were born

H6504.def: = process by which an object is split up into smaller units

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3999.def: = overflow of a large amount of water over dry land
